question: When Janie and Tea Cake first met, Tea Cake claims to have had a hard time sleeping. Why?
answer: Tea Cake couldn't sleep because he had been wishing so badly to get his hands in Janie's hair. He was captivated by her beautiful hair and couldn't stop thinking about it, saying it felt like underneath a dove's wing next to his face.
quote: It's mine too. Ah ain't been sleepin' so good for more'n uh week cause Ah been wishin' so bad tuh git mah hands in yo' hair. It's so pretty. It feels jus' lak underneath uh dove's wing next to mah face.
